page.description: Remove an event script previously added with AddEventScript.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::RemoveEventScript() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .RemoveEventScript( [ Name as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. NameOptional. The name of the script. If no name is provided, the function removes the most recently added script.
Description The RemoveEventScript() method removes an event script (see SQL Events ) from the connection. Limitations Examples
See Also SQL::Connection Object
